content.text:
# 2026 North Queensland Cowboys season

The 2026 North Queensland Cowboys season will be the 32nd in the club's history. Coached by Todd Payten and captained by Reuben Cotter and Tom Dearden, they will compete in the NRL's 2026 Telstra Premiership.
The club will play its first game in the United States in 2026 when they play their Round 1 fixture against the Newcastle Knights in Las Vegas.
